title: THE CLOCK IS TICKING… WHAT WILL HAPPEN?
content: Dr.Telli C Rajaratnam THE CLOCK IS TICKING…WHAT WILL HAPPEN? THE WHOLE GENEVA EXPEDITION SHOULD HAVE BEEN LEFT IN THE HANDS OF DIPLOMATS & PROFESSIONALS.  THEATRICS DON’T WORK IN INTERNATIONAL FORUM. CONFLICT OF INTERESTS, VESTED INTERESTS AND COMEDY OF ERRORS –THESE TOO WILL BE LESSON LEARNT! Unnecessary demonstrations, uncouth and indecent remarks about the UN, UNHRC,…
